alert.note: Alert for Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; Northern Monterey Bay; San Francisco; San Fransisco Peninsula Coast; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued September 27 at 12:51PM PDT until September 27 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Large breaking waves of 12 to 16 ft expected. * WHERE...San Francisco, Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore, San Francisco Peninsula Coast, Northern Monterey Bay and Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast Counties. * WHEN...Through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Dangerous swimming and surfing conditions and localized beach erosion. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northwest swell is starting to diminish but large breaking waves are still possible through Wednesday afternoon.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions.

area.areaDesc: Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; Northern Monterey Bay; San Francisco; San Fransisco Peninsula Coast; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast
